You want to know what it takes.

You have a great app idea. But when you try to figure out what the next step is, it’s a mess.

Should you build your app on Android, or iOS? How do you make money? And what, in the name of all that is good, is a Cloud?

In this 8-part email course, I’m going to walk you through the entire app development process.
